thread.title: Syria's Ghouta residents "wait to die" as more bombs fall

title: Syria's Ghouta residents "wait to die" as more bombs fall
text:
Syria's Ghouta residents "wait to die" as more bombs fall Wednesday, February 21, 2018 - 01:48 
Residents of Syria's eastern Ghouta district said they were waiting their ''turn to die'' on Wednesday, amid one of the most intense bombardments of the war by pro-government forces on the besieged, rebel-held enclave near Damascus. Emily Wither reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Residents of Syria's eastern Ghouta district said they were waiting their "turn to die" on Wednesday, amid one of the most intense bombardments of the war by pro-government forces on the besieged, rebel-held enclave near Damascus.
